item.title: My Emacs Configuration
item.description: Introduction Meta Packages General Personal information Reduce filesystem clutter Cleanup UI Saner defaults Beacon Theme Display battery in modeline Indent guides Cursorline Indentation Origami ialign Relative line numbers Key chords Fix scrolling Tools Terminal Emulator Treemacs Undo Tree Magit Git Gutter Ivy Evil Mode Language Server lsp-mode lsp-ui XRefs Auto Complete Languages C++ Python Scala Golang Javascript/Typescript Web Vue Emmet Org LaTeX Configuration Files Terraform Yaml Protobuf CMake Dockerfile Toml Spelling Snippets Miscellaneous dz/functions Wrap org source code blocks Open configuration Introduction What follows is my literate emacs configuration.

item.title: Reversing Packet Tracer
item.description: Reversing Stage 1: decryptPTSave Stage 2: decipher Stage 3: deobfuscateBytes Stage 4: qUncompresss Putting it All Together Patching Bypassing Login Forging 100% Resources Reversing Thankfully Cisco developers seem to have forgotten to strip the binary’s symbols of the Linux version, so we are going to take advantage of it; this will help up tremendously in the reversing process and it will save us a huge amount of time as we won’t have to locate the functions that were interested in.
